include/dai/prob.h File Reference

Defines TProb<> and Prob classes which represent (probability) vectors (e.g., probability distributions of discrete random variables). More...

 Represents a vector with entries of type dai::Real.

Detailed Description

Defines TProb<> and Prob classes which represent (probability) vectors (e.g., probability distributions of discrete random variables).
